DOC.brief_summary: This study aim identify difference bladder contraction storage phase ( non voiding activity ) OAB subject healthy subject , use high resolution urodynamics . The study divide two part : - PART 1 : Consists 5 female overactive bladder - PART 2 : Consists 25 female overactive bladder 15 healthy female Part 1 subject enrol follow part 2 subject . The data part 1 subject review analyse group expert start second part ( part 2 ) study .
DOC.brief_title: An Exploratory Study Investigate Bladder Contractions Storage Phase Related Bladder Sensations Healthy Females Females With Overactive Bladder ( OAB ) Using High Resolution Conventional Urodynamics
DOC.detailed_description: The subject complete total 2 visit follow telephone call ( visit investigator 's discretion ) . Upon meet eligibility criterion subject screen complete visit hospital ( Visit 1 ) . They ask complete procedure micturition diary , questionnaires applicable discontinue ongoing OAB medication . Upon confirmation eligibility criterion subject enrol complete visit 2 within 6 31 day post V1 . At Visit 2 subject complete high resolution urodynamic assessment follow conventional urodynamic assessment . The visit take approximately half day . Safety follow phone call ( visit investigator 's discretion ) take place 4 6 day post visit 2 .
DOC.criteria: OAB Subjects Has history sign symptom OAB include urinary frequency , urgency urge incontinence great equal 3 month At enrolment visit ( V2 ) subject must : At least 1 episode urgency without incontinence last 3day micturition diary Frequency micturition great equal 8 per 24 hour period 3day micturition diary period At screen visit , subject either na√Øve OAB treatment ( e.g prior history medication treat low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) , include OAB ) currently treatment LUTS ( include OAB ) willing undergo washout period 3 week Main Exclusion criterion : Healthy subject History low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) , include OAB History stress urinary incontinence , urethral sphincter incompetence neurogenic detrusor overactivity History sign symptom suggestive urinary tract infection ( confirm positive urine analysis ) History bladder outlet obstruction ( include detrusoroveractivity ) example bladder/vesicouterine prolapse ( > grade II ) chronic obstruction History urinary tract surgery less equal 6 month prior screen Has indwelling catheter permanent catheter fit History pelvic area radiotherapy treatment Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus History fibromyalgia Pregnant intend become pregnant study sexually active , childbearing potential unwilling utilize reliable method birth control ( note : reliable method contraceptive pill combination type , hormonal implant , injectable contraceptive , sexual abstinence vasectomize partner ) Pregnancy within 6 month screen breast feeding within 3 month screen History positive hepatitis A , B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody HIV test result . Any use drug abuse within 3 month prior screen visit . History smoke 10 cigarette ( equivalent amount tobacco ) per day within 3 month prior screen visit History drinking 14 unit alcohol per week ( 1 unit = 10 g pure alcohol = 250 ml beer ( 5 % ) 35 ml spirit ( 35 % ) 100 ml wine ( 12 % ) within 3 month prior screen visit Is currently receive history treatment alpha blocker , beta receptor blocker agonist , botulinum toxin ( le 12 month ) , resiniferatoxin pelvic floor muscle relaxant less equal 9 month prior screen Main exclusion criterion OAB subject Refer healthy subject exclusion criterion number 2 16
